name: Redash
title: redash.io
shortDescription: Redash is a comprehensive data analysis tool designed for teams and individuals who need to derive insights from their data. It supports SQL, NoSQL, Big Data, and API data sources, allowing users to query multiple databases to answer complex questions. Users can enjoy a powerful SQL editor, create visualizations, and share dashboards. Ideal for data analysts and companies aiming for informed decision-making.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Looker
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Big data analytics with robust integration

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Metabase
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Open source and easy to set up
